author: game.changer.wallet
title: GameChanger: smart contract support
description: GameChanger has no-code DAPP connector since months. Shelley DAPPs are posible, but Goguen DeFi era using the same JSON API is needed.
solution: We will research and add smart contract support aiming to provide the easiest posible DAPP integrations to help onboard builders & students
experience: GameChanger Finance delivers great value with its next generation wallet and dapps, teaming up Gimbalabs, Dandelion and Yoroi contributors
